Result

Manage a result set from a database query.

Summary
Result
Manage a result set from a database query.
Functions
fetchRow
Fetch one Row from the result set.
fetchAll
Fetch all results into a Row array
finish
Finish resultset.

Functions

fetchRow

Fetch one Row from the result set.

Returns

Row objectif another row existed
nullif the last row has already been fetched

fetchAll

Fetch all results into a Row array

Returns

Row[]either empty or will content

finish

Finish resultset.  This should be called if you terminate a query without fetching all results.

Provide access to a single row in a result set.
